text:
="preserve">49th Street is a station on the BMT Broadway Line of the New York City Subway. Located t the intersection of 49th Street and 7th Avenue in Midtown Manhattan. It is served by the N, Q, R and W trains.
Behind the station is Times Square.
This station is for N, Q, R and W trains.
After this station on the Broadway Line, the next stations will be 57th Street Seventh Avenue and Times Square 42nd Street.
